# init(device:)

**Initializer**

Creates a slider to control the exposure bias of the specified capture device.

## Declaration

```swift
init(device: AVCaptureDevice)
```

## Parameters

- **device**: The capture device to control.

## Discussion

You can only create an exposure bias slider with a device that support’s setting its [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/exposureTargetBias] property value.

## Creating an exposure bias slider

- **init(device:action:)**: Creates a slider to control the exposure bias of the specified capture device with an action to respond to exposure bias changes.
